author: mrmitch
title: Great set for kids 3-6 years old-hours of fun
review: I don't own alot of Duplo but this is bye far my favorite one. It comes with enough pieces to rearrage the track and surroundings. The part that shoots the cars down the track work very well, you can combine all of the track and the car will travel the entire length. I liked this set so much I bought two as gifts for small nephews of mine. Good amount of people with set a plus and it does something keeps little one busy.

author: modena
title: Race to the finish line... And beyond!
review:
I got this set when I was very little. Now I have lost the paper, but the pieces still live!

Pros:

  • Slammers!
  • Lots of parts for a gas station!
  • Contains a little boy!
  • Contains a trophy!
  • Contains big plates and 2 fences!
  • Contains rare columns!
  • Contains a podium!
  • Contains more small trophies!
  • Transparent green tracks!
  • Contains a Video Camera!
  • Contains a paper length measurer!
  • Contains two cars!
  • Contains 4 minifigures!
  • Contains lots and lots of more stuff!

Cons:

  • Just some building!
  • It's Duplo. (not important!)
  • The track is a bit short!
  • The paper length measurer does rip.

Overall:

First of all, this set contains lots of things that can also be used for making gas stations, Train layouts, roller coasters, and much more. It contains two slammers. They work really well, even with the train carriage in the 3327. They even work so well that the cars race off the short track! You could put the tracks together, then it would be much easier. I really liked all the trophies in this, both the big one and the small trophy bricks. It also contains a Video Camera, which I just love, and a little Duplo boy.

Overall, this was a great set, and it still is. Anyone will enjoy this set (but mostly small ones)!!
